ygData.msgSnippet: Sunhawk got nervous, but  still held his sword towards them. Sunhawk:  I m suppose to by that slag (*chuckles he s not showing his nervousness*).  You showed

Sunhawk got nervous, but  still held his sword towards them.

Sunhawk:  I'm suppose to by that slag (*chuckles he's not showing his 
nervousness*).  You showed no sign of wanting to die on the battle 
today.  And believe me I'm the one with nothing to lose, 2 dead 
Pred's to gain, I saw the way you looked at Hot Rod (I think he was 
in the same room as both of them at one point so who can complain), 
if you live you still have your lover, I lost mine.  So you have far 
less reason to blast us all to bits then I have to let you. Besides 
I'm pretty good at judging character, you are vain and self orented, 
while if you can judge my character I'm willing to give my life to 
end your's.  So what's it going to be.  Oh and if your friend even 
thinks about firing again I assure you I can put this charge right in 
the path of his lasers and blow us all to bits anyway.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > He turned on his comm to Talos.
> >
> > Sunhawk:  TALOS, BOTH PREDS ARE LOOSE!  I'M TRYING TO
> > RESTRAIN THEM, BUT YOU MIGHT WANT TO SEND HOT ROD BACK
> > HERE.  HE WAS SUPPOSE TO GUARD THE FEMALE SO THIS IS
> > HIS MESS!  HE SHOULD HELP ME CLEAN IT UP!
> >
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Nightshade didn't even bother to try and block the grab and 
sword
> placement, rather her hands came up attaching two magnetic and 
quickly
> blinking explosive charges to it's surface. "Surrender, or I blow 
us all to
> space dust Sunhawk. You'll never disarm them before they both blow 
a gaping
> hole in the middle of your ship."
> 
>     Turning her head her eye looked back at Sunhawks, "I've nothing 
to
> lose...everything to gain. Stand down or I get the final victory. 
And you'll
> never get out of blast radius before they go off so don't even 
think of
> throwing your sword away and running to 'leave us to our 
doom'...there's no
> escape unless you surrender."
